invalidInputPolicy.testName: Validate the appearance of the error messages on enabling of the Deployment Constraint without providing value to its related fields.

deploymentConstraintsOnly.errorMsg: Please provide a value for one or more fields in the Deployment Constraints section or disable this option.

invalidInputPolicy.testName: create a policy having all toggle buttons turned on but don’t populated data in the related fields just turn-on toggle button and hit save. Assert the error message.

invalidInputPolicy.description: Turn On All Toggle Buttons Description

turnAllToggleButtonOn.errorMsg: Please select an application to apply this policy to.

invalidToggleButtonInputPolicy.testName: Validate the appearance of the error messages on entering -1 (Negative) value in all fields of Deployment Constraint and Offline Usage Control.
invalidToggleButtonInputPolicy.name: Negative -1 Value Check
invalidToggleButtonInputPolicy.description: We will check toggle inputs by using negative values

invalidToggleButtonInputPolicy.testName: Valdate the appearance of the error messages on entering Zero value in all fields of Deployment Constraint and Offline Usage Control.
invalidToggleButtonInputPolicy.name: Zero Value Check

invalidToggleButtonInputPolicy.testName: Valdate the appearance of the error messages on entering Max limit exceeding value in all fields of Deployment Constraint and Offline Usage Control.
invalidToggleButtonInputPolicy.name: Exceeded Value Check
invalidToggleButtonInputPolicy.description: We will check toggle inputs by using exceeded values

Create a Policy with 10 digits in name and description having 100 value in all fields of both Deployment Constraint and Offline Usage Controls. Now delete this policy after successful verification for performing cleaning operation.
